desc: Music in immersive audio on Pure Audio Blu-ray, Hybrid SACD and HD audio files. Worldwide delivery. The Norwegian label 2L have garnered no less than 39 GRAMMY nominations since 2006, 31 of these in craft categories Best Engineered Album, Best Surround Sound Album, Best Immersive Audio Album and Producer of the Year.

layout.text:
Music in immersive audio on Pure Audio Blu-ray and Hybrid SACD.
HD audio files. GRAMMY Award-winning label. Worldwide delivery.
